boardgame.name: Lignum (second edition)
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Starting with a limited amount of resources and workers, you set out to run your lumber mill as efficiently as possible. Savvy investments and proper planning will ensure that your mill will be the most profitable. Be cautious, however, for competition is fierce! You will need to secure the best cutting areas, make use of limited contract workers, and continually update and replace your equipment. Your competitors are not the only thing to worry about as you will also need to store enough firewood and food to survive the harsh winters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Lignum is a strategic optimization game that portrays the logging industry in the 19th century. Each round, players travel to the nearby forest, picking up tools and hiring workers along the way. After felling timber, players must decide how to transport their wood to their sawmills and if the wood should be processed or sold immediately, all the while optimizing their entire processing chain._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The second edition of Lignum also includes the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Joinery _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Buildings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; expansion. In this expansion, players can visit two additional locations along the supply path. Players may now acquire special buildings that give them unique, special abilities for the remainder of the game. Additionally, players can acquire joiners to help generate more income each round; if those joiners are supplied with the appropriate wood, players can earn extra money at the end of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep05: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m Cutting Wood And Selling It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;
Episode 118 -- The Ranch of Failed Sessions
Episode 29 - If Only We Were Filthy Rich
Lignum, Rising Sun Top 40-31 Games of All Time - Boards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Swords #97
RDTN Episode 123: Lignum, Downforce, Indulgence, and The Lost Expedition
